welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Caln, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport handles all cargo and freight operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A-West
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, American Eagle, and British Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal A-East
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta, Frontier, JetBlue, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, American Eagle, and Spirit.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Air Canada, American Airlines, American Eagle, United, and United Express.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, American Eagle, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, American Eagle, and Qatar Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, American Eagle, and Southwest.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
